variable.name: FORM
variable.description: EDIC form number

variable.name: CLINIC
variable.description: A1. Identifying information. Deidentified EDIC clinic number

variable.name: IDB1B
variable.description: B1b. Recognition event: if date uncertain

variable.name: IDB3
variable.description: B3. Recognition event. How did clinic learn of the event
variable.value: Annual medical history and physical exam
Clinic recognized event and informed patient

variable.name: IDC1A
variable.description: C1a. Nature of event. Was the patient treated by: psychiatric social worker

variable.name: IDC1B
variable.description: C1b. Nature of event. Was the patient treated by: psychologist

variable.name: IDC1C
variable.description: C1c. Nature of event. Was the patient treated by: psychiatrist

variable.name: IDC1D
variable.description: C1d. Nature of event. Was the patient treated by: other

variable.name: IDC1DOTH
variable.description: C1d. Nature of event. Was the patient treated by: specify

variable.name: IDC2
variable.description: C2. Nature of event. Patient receive outpatient treatment

variable.name: IDC2A
variable.description: C2a. Nature of event. Patient receive outpatient treatment in emergency room

variable.name: IDC2B
variable.description: C2b. Nature of event. Patient receive outpatient treatment in office

variable.name: IDC2C
variable.description: C2c. Nature of event. Medical/surgical inpatient primary medical problem

variable.name: IDC2D
variable.description: C2d. Nature of event. Outpatient treatment other

variable.name: IDC2DOTH
variable.description: C2cd. Nature of event. Patient receive outpatient treatment: specify

variable.name: IDC3
variable.description: C3. Nature of event. Patient receive inpatient treatment

variable.name: IDC4
variable.description: C4. Nature of event. Using criteria in Diagnostic and Statistical Manual of Mental Disorders

variable.name: IDCDIAGN
variable.description: C4. Nature of event. Specify the diagnosis

variable.name: FSASDATE
variable.description: A4. Identifying information. Deidentified date form completed

variable.name: MASK_PAT
variable.description: A2. Identifying information. Deidentified patient ID

variable.name: IDB1ADAT
variable.description: B1a. Recognition event. Deidentified date of occurrence

variable.name: IDB2DAT
variable.description: B2. Recognition event. Deidentified date clinic learned of the event
